Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelSubject
public class Game extends Object implements ModelSubject
A class that represent a single Game It contains and manages the classes of the model and their observers

    • getWinner

      public Player getWinner() throws NoSuchElementException
      Checks which player has the highest score and returns it. If two or more players have the same score, the winner is the one who played last
      Returns:
      the winner of the game
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException
